description:
Ogre shows off its overwhelming strength, but Beta takes control of every machine he can lay hands on to fight it. Alma shows a glimpse of a will that no android could have during her battle with Soma. Meanwhile, Kondo and the others safely escort Jinkokusha out of the island.
As the battle between Ogre and Beta grows ever fiercer, Auctioneer reveals that he`s Akira`s brother and tells the story of how Alpha and Beta had come to be.
Source: crunchyroll
